title: Stoxs
description: Web scraper written in Python using Beautiful Soup and Pandas that scrapes closing-market table data from Wall Street Journal and automatically stores and queries sorted data from over 4000 companies in locally hosted MySQL server.
Text-based user interface that allows users to view specific sets of data, export tables to .csv files, and visualize stock data through different graphs created with Matplotlib.
